mil3.6.1:1.4_0: “Atha kissa nu kho, bhante, kelāyatha mamāyathā”ti?
mil3.6.1:1.5_0: “Kiṁ pana te, mahārāja, kadāci karahaci saṅgāmagatassa kaṇḍappahāro hotī”ti?
mil3.6.1:1.7_1: so vaṇo ālepena ca ālimpīyati telena ca makkhīyati sukhumena ca coḷapaṭṭena paliveṭhīyatī”ti?
mil3.6.1:1.8_0: “Āma, bhante, ālepena ca ālimpīyati telena ca makkhīyati sukhumena ca coḷapaṭṭena paliveṭhīyatī”ti.
mil3.6.1:1.9_2: tena ālepena ca ālimpīyati telena ca makkhīyati sukhumena ca coḷapaṭṭena paliveṭhīyatī”ti?
mil3.6.1:1.10_2: api ca maṁsassa ruhanatthāya ālepena ca ālimpīyati telena ca makkhīyati sukhumena ca coḷapaṭṭena paliveṭhīyatī”ti.
mil3.6.1:1.11_2: atha ca pabbajitā anajjhositā kāyaṁ pariharanti brahmacariyānuggahāya.
mil3.6.1:1.12_2: tena pabbajitā vaṇamiva kāyaṁ pariharanti anajjhositā.
